name: Infection (RozanBR)
description:
Infection

Game submission for the Weekly Game Jam #150! Theme: You're the Enemy.

Infection is a game which you play as a Virus and your goal is to infect all the humans in the level. The game uses the infection mechanic and once a human is infected it can then be spread to other humans. At this stage of the game all humans can be infected and spread the virus.

Humans recover from the virus giving enough time, they can also recover by hitting Heal Boxes, once they are recovered there is a cooldown before they can be infected again.

Controls for the Game:

W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys - Movement

Spacebar - Infect Human

Feedback is highly appreciated!

Stay safe and keep on Gaming!
